item.title: Bins overflowing corner of Bloomfield and Raglan, 16th February
item.description:

item.title: The denmark hill estate, 16th February
item.description:
I have lived here for nearly 30 years ...it used to be a beautiful estate ... now it is uncept and covered in litter blowing around . the trees are not pruned the hedges are not cut back and the leaves not swept ...i am paying my service charges for a service we do not get anymore ... please help
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crossthwaite Avenue, Dulwich Village, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish everywhere blowing up street, 16th February
item.description:
The new development put on the front of denmark hill estate ..where the council help office used to be ..is empty and the builders have left all there rubbish in the front gardens of the flats it is blowing to the bus stop and down road ... very unsightly and a dead fox too .. unhygenic ..awful to walk past ... they have also made a small area out the front that floods when it rains and makes the pavement icy in extreme cold ... i watch 6 people fall the last cold day .... it is more than normal ice as it has constant water flowing ....please help ... have cleared some myself
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dulwich Village, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
